text: Sudha Shivpuri (14 July 1937 – 20 May 2015) was an Indian stage, movie and television actress. She was known for her role as "Baa" in the Hindi TV serial Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi (2000–2008). Shivpuri died from multiple organ failure on 20 May 2015 in Mumbai, India, aged 78.'Baa' of 'Kyunki', Sudha Shivpuri, passes away ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1937 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from multiple organ failure Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian stage actors Category:Indian television actors
title: Sudha Shivpuri
